name: LowHosting
steps: At the right of the page press the Open Ticket button
Call your ticket Minecraft mod requires UDP port and ask if they could please open a port on your server. Specify that the DDoS protection might cause issues and ask to have it disabled.
Select General in the ticket section and use medium priority
The staff will open a port for you and give you the port number
Set the port property in the voice chat server config to the port you got in the previous step
